ModMetaData.name: NomadsLand
ModMetaData.author: Why_is_that
ModMetaData.description:
[b]NomadsLand[/b] Work to create ruleset and player factions to encourage nomadic and 100% raid style of play.
[b]Features[/b] - New scenerio rule to disallow all buildings - Add faction and pawn kind definitions for spacer-like player faction - Implemented scenerio using rule, faction, and pawn kinds.
